item.title: Small Wins Matter
item.description: Collect the small wins along the way Boost motivation, productivity, and creativity by celebrating daily progress Link to heading Teams must celebrate the small wins. It’s easy to forget there were probably more than a few minor achievements along the way that led to larger ones. We all have been there, caught up in what wasn’t achieved, or focusing on the big “accomplished” picture, eventually forgetting the path to getting there.
